about.

Hey, and welcome to my online portfolio! If you're reading this, you're probably one of the first so thank you for popping by! With the help of some friends, I've been designing and building this website over the past few weeks and I'm not going to lie, I'm pretty happy with how it's turned out! (except for the profile photo yikes...)

Day-to-day, I'm a Test Automation Engineer at a leading Art Services company called HENI, if you're into art definitely check them out! Alongside my work at HENI, I'm always looking for new ways to improve my skill set and at the moment my focus is on learning Typescript, React and Apollo. I might even rewrite this website using that tech stack, who knows!? Anyway, have yourself a great day and feel free to drop me a message, I'm open to collaborating on exciting projects. 05-04-22
